message: Hi Name,

After an active U.S. Supreme Court term, there is plenty to talk about! Join Illinois Law Dean and Professor Vikram Amar and Cornell Law School Professor Michael Dorf as they participate in an exciting discussion of SCOTUS decisions (and lack of decision) this term, moderated by Rutgers Law School Adjunct Professor David Kemp.
Presentation details are below:

Date: Wednesday, July 19, 2023
Time: 3:00 p.m. ET/12:00 p.m. PT
Where: Virtually via Justia Connect
Duration: 60 Minutes
